Title: Provides for the payment of compensation by the department of environmental conservation to electronic waste collection sites, collection facilities and recycling facilities
Summary: Provides for the payment of compensation by the department of environmental conservation to electronic waste collection sites, consolidation facilities and recycling facilities for costs not paid by a manufacturer or manufacturers of electronic equipment.
LawCode: Amd ยง27-2605, En Con L; amd ยง92-s, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the state finance law, in relation to manufacturer liability for the cost of collection, handling, and recycling and reuse of electronic waste, and compensation by the state to electronic waste collection sites, consolidation facilities and recycling facilities for those costs not paid by a manufacturer
